content: Hi, first-time poster here. I’ve been referred to zulip by https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71529#issuecomment-629211792, mentioning a t-libs stream, but I can’t see such a stream in the nav bar — where should such discussion (on naming a new concurrency primitive) take place?
@Roland Kuhn Click on the "gear" icon, and hit "All streams" in the top left, you can then search and subscribe to the stream.
cool, thanks! there definitely are way too many chat tools these days …
